modName: ENB Water on Horse Trough and Blacksmith Forge
summary:
This fixes the empty horse trough with the ENB Water.
You will see all ENB Water features on the horse trough such as the water caustic.
descriptionHtml:
Thank you for taking time to download and endorsing this mod.

[heading][color=yellow]What is this mod[/color][/heading]
If you use the ENB Water feature, you'll notice all horse trough would look as if they are empty.
This mod will show the water with the ENB Water enabled, and all features such as the water caustic would be displayed.

[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/58061-1-1410497974.gif[/img]

[heading][color=yellow]ELFX with SMIM and ENB massive fps drop fix[/color][/heading]
I moved [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60603/?]ELFX fps patch[/url] to its own mod.

[heading][color=yellow]Credit[/color][/heading]
Boris for his awesome ENB
Bethesda for the awesom Skyrim and CreationKit

[heading][color=yellow]Required[/color][/heading]
ENB binary files: [url=http://enbdev.com/download_mod_tesskyrim.htm]ENB download[/url] or [url=http://enbdev.com/download_mod_tesskyrim.html]ENB download[/url]
Any ENB preset such as my [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76783]OrganicENB v2 preset[/url]

[heading][color=cyan]Recommended mod[/color][/heading]
The blacksmith forge is not covered by this mod, but you can use the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18818]Blacksmithforge water fix by hexaae/rolloLG[/url] to see the same ENB Water on the blacksmith forge.  Just make sure this mod is activated after the hexaae's mod.  Here's the SkyForge screen capture using the rolloLG mod and this mod together.

[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/58061-1-1410577037.gif[/img]
author: Skysan4298
